definitions.title: vb. denom.
definitions.body: be, or become king, or queen, reign;—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: :296 Pf. ´[[מ]] Jos 13:10 + etc.; Impf. [[יִמְלֽךְ]] ([[לוֹךְ]]-) Ex 15:18 +; [[וַיִּמְלֽח]] Ge 36:32 +; 2 ms. [[תִּמְלֽךְ]] Ge 37:8 +, ([[הֲתִִֽמֲלֽךְ]] Je 22:15 Baer); Imv. [[מְלָח־]] Ju Jdg 9:14; [[מָלְכָה]] Ju Jdg 9:8; [[מָלְכִי]] Ju Jdg 9:10, Jdg 9:12; Inf. abs. [[מָלֽךְ]] Ge 37:8, 1Sa 24:21; cstr.. [[מְלֽךְ]] 1Ki 2:15 +; sf. [[מָלְכוֹ]] 1Sa 13:1 +; Pt. [[מׂלֵךְ]] Je 22:11 + 2 t.; [[מׂלֶכֶת]] 2Ki 11:3 = 2Ch 22:12; —be (become) king, reign, mostly of Hebrew kings, 2Sa 2:10, 1Ki 16:22, 2Ki 3:l, 2Ki 9:13, but also gen. Pr 8:15, Pr 30:22; of Can., Edom., Aram., Assyr., Pers. kings, etc.: Ju Jdg 4:2, Ge 36:31, 1Ki 11:25, 2Ki 8:15, 2Ki 19:37, Es 1:1 +; sq. [[בְּ]] loc. (usu. city) Jos 13:10, Jos 13:12, Ju Jdg 4:2, 2Sa 5:5, 1Ki 11:24, 1Ki 14:21 + oft.; but also Ge 36:31, Ge 36:32, 1Ch 1:43 [[בְּארץ]], and even [[בְּכׂלאֲשֶׁר־תְּאַוֶּה נַפְשְֶָׁ]] 2Sa 3:21; sq. [[עַל]] c. people or land 1Sa 8:9, 1Sa 8:11, 1Sa 12:14, 1Sa 13:1, 1Ki 15:1, 1Ki 15:9, 1Ki 16:23 + oft.; sq. [[בְּ]] loc. + [[עַל]] territ. (or pop.) 2Sa 5:5, 1Ki 11:42; sq. [[תַּחַת]] ([[חַחְתָּיו]]) 2Sa 16:8, Ge 36:33 f. = 1Ch 1:44 f., 1Ki 14:20, 1Ki 14:31, 2Ki 8:15, 2Ki 13:24, Je 22:11 + oft.; † subj. God, sq. [[על]] Ps 47:9, Mic 4:7, Ez Eze 20:33, 1Sa 8:7; sq. [[בְּ]] Is 24:23; abs. Ex 15:18, Is 52:7, Ps 93:1, Ps 96:10 = 1Ch 16:31, Ps 97:1, Ps 99:1, Ps 146:10 +; subj. future (Mess.) king Is 32:l, Je 23:5; † subj. a woman (= be queen) 2Ki 11:3 = 2Ch 22:12 (both sq. [[עַל]]), Es 2:4 sq. [[תַּחַת]] †; Imv. only in fable, king of trees, Ju Jdg 9:8, Jdg 9:10, Jdg 9:12, Jdg 9:14 all sq. [[על]]; [[בְּמָלְכוֹ]] esp. = when he began to reign, became king 1Sa 13:1, 2Sa 2:10, 1Ki 14:21 + oft.; Inf. also = reign: [[בְּשְׁנַת שְׁמׂנֶה]] [[לְמָלְכוֹ]] 2Ki 24:12, 2Ki 25:1, cf. v:2Ki 25:27; 1Ki 6:l, 2Ch 16:13, 2Ch 17:7, 2Ch 29:3, 2Ch 34:3, 2Ch 34:8, cf. [[עַד מְלֽךְ דָּוִד]] 1Ch 4:31; [[עַד מְלֽךְ]] [[מַלְכוּת פָּרָס]] 2Ch 36:20; began to reign and reigned [[מָלַךְ וַיִּמְלֽךְ]] 1Ki 15:25, 1Ki 16:29, 2Ki 3:1 +; oft. [[מָלַךְ]] alone with same meaning 1Ki 16:23, 2Ki 13:1, 2Ki 13:10, 2Ki 14:23 +. †
